abstract: Tonya Carpenter, Boston Red Sox fan who was struck in head by broken bat at Fenway Park, is in serious condition at Boston hospital, but is expected to survive.
lead_paragraph: The woman was in serious condition at a hospital a day after being hit in the head during a game between the Red Sox and the Athletics.

headline.main: Fan Expected to Survive Injury From Shattered Bat at Fenway
headline.print_headline: Fan Expected to Survive Injury From Shattered Bat at Fenway

snippet: The woman was in serious condition at a hospital a day after being hit in the head during a game between the Red Sox and the Athletics.
